ingredients.item: 6 essential Waitrose British chicken thigh fillets, cut into 2cm pieces
2 tbsp shaoxing rice wine (or dry sherry)
1½ tbsp demerara sugar (or other brown sugar)

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large wok or frying pan set over a high heat. Once smoking hot, add the chicken and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until browned in places. Add the ginger, the white part of the salad onions (reserve the green tops, to serve), five spice powder, garlic and ½ the chilli; fry for 3-4 minutes, until fragrant.

Splash in the rice wine (or sherry), soy, sugar and 2 tbsp water. Boil rapidly for 6-8 minutes, stirring often, until everything is coated in a sticky glaze. Scatter over the reserved salad onion tops and chilli. Serve with steamed white rice and pak choi, if liked.
